name: Summer Days at Crystal Lake
description:
Your typical dating sim, trying to win over Jason Voorhees, but not the killer of crystal lake, but the Camp Counselor!

Based on an AU created by Junkmix, your goal is to either befriend or romance Jason. But be careful! Pamela doesn't trust you one bit.

At the moment, this is only a demo and doesn't include the full game. 

My hope for this game is to find more people to help me make it if its possible. Mainly with character sprites, background art, storytelling, and most importantly someone whose familiar with coding in Ren'Py. I've been fortunate enough to at least figure out the demo through some research, but I plan to implement code that may be more complicated than I'm familiar with.
